rows.label: qst102101_msg0001
rows.name: ...Odd.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0002
rows.name:
Recently, Hræsvelgr mercenary missions
have been encountering unforeseen
difficulties.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0003
rows.name:
Like finding subjugation targets already
subjugated, or harvest areas ravaged...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0004
rows.name:
It very much looks like planned
interference.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0005
rows.name:
Actually, the rise of these hindrances
largely coincides with the rise in
our mercenaries' numbers...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0006
rows.name:
Could it be that there are
spies in our midst...?

rows.label: qst102101_msg0007
rows.name:
I don't like that thought, but
I must have certainty.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0008
rows.name: But discreetly...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0009
rows.name:
You lot keep Vandham's will alive.
I'm sure I can trust you with this...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0010
rows.name: Here's what we'll do.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0011
rows.name:
I'll send you on a subjugation mission
with some new mercenary recruits.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0012
rows.name:
You'll watch for signs of any
suspicious activity. Okay?

rows.label: qst102101_msg0013
rows.name: Right. Then let me call the other three.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0101
rows.name: You're here.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0102
rows.name: Let's have some introductions...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0103
rows.name:
I'm Rex, a salvager!
Pleased to meet you!

rows.label: qst102101_msg0104
rows.name:
Me Bamibami.
Looking forward, meh!

rows.label: qst102101_msg0105
rows.name: Juddit here.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0106
rows.name: ...I'm Arthem.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0107
rows.name:
I've got a subjugation mission
for the four of you.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0108
rows.name:
We've confirmed the presence of
twelve Spike Urchon.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0109
rows.name:
Nasty buggers...
I need you to wipe them all out.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0110
rows.name: Twelve is a lot...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0111
rows.name:
That's why you'll need to
work together on this.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0112
rows.name: Can I refuse?

rows.label: qst102101_msg0113
rows.name:
I joined this mercenary company
specifically so I wouldn't have to
rely on other chumps.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0114
rows.name:
I'm not about to team up with
a buncha amateurs.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0115
rows.name:
Excusing, Ms. Juddit...
Can Bamibami ask to not rock boat?

rows.label: qst102101_msg0116
rows.name:
Cooperation is name of game here
in Hræsvelgr Mercenary Company...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0117
rows.name: We can split up.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0118
rows.name: Me still talking here...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0119
rows.name: Agreed.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0120
rows.name:
You make a lot of sense, for an
Superbian!

rows.label: qst102101_msg0121
rows.name: Three enemies each.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0122
rows.name: Uh, but if we don't stick together...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0123
rows.name: It's more efficient this way.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0124
rows.name:
Hmpth...
Fine. After defeating, meet in camp
looking down on Farlaine Wells.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0125
rows.name: Got it. Will do.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0126
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: qst102101_msg0127
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Hmm...
More efficient? Sounds more like
plain selfishness if you ask me...

rows.label: qst102101_msg0128
rows.name: ...Best of luck to you.
